item.title: Contact me
item.description: Before contacting me, please take note of the following: please be polite, Iâ€™ll always be polite to you; if you’re a recruiter I would prefer if you get in touch through LinkedIn, where you can also see a more detailed profile. Email: edoardo.tenani@pm.me Email is the easiest way to get in touch with me. Expect a reply in a day or two.

item.title: About me
item.description: ðŸ‘‹ I’m Edoardo! I’m a software engineer based in Italy. I’m currently working at Elastic, the search company, as a software engineer in the Integrations team for Elastic Observability. Before that, I’ve been a DevOps engineer at Arduino, the Open-Source electronic prototyping platform.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: All stories should start from somewhere! This is where the story for my website starts.
